Text: thank you, this sounds shit!  we are glad you made such a great synopsis. now i will never read it, despite having a cool title..... sorry about the harsh language, but, umm , do people spend money on this stuff.?.. hmmmm.
If you know Grant Morrison, you'll know what to expect. xD If not, just don't read it.
Sounds interesting enough to give it a try. Thanks a lot for all the work, Hamster-X.
